text: Bishop William Regis Fey, O.F.M.Cap. (November 6, 1942 – January 19, 2021) was an American Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. He became a priest in 1968. Fey was appointed bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Kimbe, in Kimbe, Papua New Guinea, on June 8, 2010. Fey died on January 19, 2021 in Pittsburgh at the age of 78.Bishop William Regis Fey, O.F.M. Cap. † ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Pennsylvania Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Pittsburgh
title: William Fey
